description:
Course Updated 22 January 2016

Why are 16,560 students wanting me to mentor them in 37 Udemy courses? 16,560 students have started learning from me since August 7th 2015. Shouldn't you find out why?

Are you ready to embark on your quest for ultimate happiness? Have you struggled to find a state of happiness whenever you would like? You are about to learn why happiness affects more than just your life.

Focus is critical to being happy. Happiness is a process and not a destination. You will need to work on your happiness continuously (don't worry there are simple steps to implement)

You will also learn why tracking your thoughts will be essential and you will have a simple method to change any negative thoughts into positive ones in an instant.

Discover why internal and external factors have affected your happiness levels. Once you understand which factors you need to link to, you will be well on your way to ultimate happiness.

Take this course today. You are covered with a 30 day money back guarantee so get onto the fast track to ultimate happiness now.
title: The Happiness Factor - Your Ultimate Happiness Depends on It
